---
title: "Welcome to the ggblab blog"
date: 2026-01-16
layout: post
---

This blog will host updates, educational posts, and notes about ggblab.

Topics to expect:

- Project updates and release notes
- Teaching materials and lesson notebooks
- Design rationale and architecture deep-dives

You can preview locally with `jekyll serve --source blog` (requires Ruby + Jekyll).
